trans-unit.source: Defines a geometric shape, described using a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 定义几何形状，所述使用<xref href="System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This geometry is light-weight alternative to <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>: it does not support data binding, animation, or modification.
trans-unit.target: 该几何图形是轻量替代<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"> </xref>︰ 它不支持数据绑定、 动画或修改。

trans-unit.source: Use a StreamGeometry when you need to describe a complex geometry but do not want the overhead of supporting data binding, animation, or modification.
trans-unit.target: 使用 StreamGeometry 时需要描述复杂的几何图形，但不是希望支持数据绑定、 动画或修改的开销。

trans-unit.source: Because of its efficiency, the StreamGeometry class is a good choice for describing adorners.
trans-unit.target: 由于其效率，StreamGeometry 类是一个不错的选择，用于描述装饰器。

trans-unit.source: A StreamGeometry cannot be serialized if it contains a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Transform> or any non-stroked or unfilled segments.
trans-unit.target: 如果它包含，不能序列 StreamGeometry<xref:System.Windows.Media.Transform>或任何非描边或未填充的线段。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Transform>

trans-unit.source: Freezable Features A StreamGeometry is a <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> type.
trans-unit.target: 可冻结功能 StreamGeometry 是<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>类型。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 璝惠<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>功能，如冻结和克隆，请参阅[可冻结对象概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *moveAndDrawCommands* One or more move and draw commands.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 属性用法``` ``` # # XAML 值*moveAndDrawCommands*一个或多个移动和绘制命令。

trans-unit.source: See [Path Markup Syntax](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[路径标记语法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new, empty instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化一个新的空实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that is exactly large enough to contain this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref>即刚好足以包含此<xref href="System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method does not take any pen into account when calculating the geometry's bounds.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不考虑任何钢笔计算的几何图形的边界时。

trans-unit.source: The bounding box of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此边界框<xref href="System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Removes all geometric information from this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 从这中移除所有几何信息<xref href="System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry"> </xref>，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （但可能不再解析），但不是动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry"></xref>对象，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、 数据绑定和动画，而其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines how the intersecting areas contained in this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry"></xref> are combined.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，确定如何在此包含的相交区域<xref href="System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry"></xref>相结合。

trans-unit.source: **EvenOdd** Determines the "insideness" of a point on the shape by drawing a ray from that point to infinity in any direction and counting the number of path segments from the given shape that the ray crosses.
trans-unit.target: **EvenOdd**通过从该点绘制射向无穷远任意方向和计算中给定形状中与该射线相交的路径段的个数来确定在形状上的点的"内部性"。

trans-unit.source: If this number is odd, the point is inside; if even, the point is outside.
trans-unit.target: 如果此数字为奇数，该点在内部;如果偶数，该点在外部。

trans-unit.source: **NonZero** Determines the "insideness" of a point on the shape by drawing a ray from that point to infinity in any direction and then examining the places where a segment of the shape crosses the ray.
trans-unit.target: **非零**绘制从该点向任意方向的无穷远的射线，然后检查段形状与射线相交的位置确定的形状上的点的"内部性"。

trans-unit.source: Starting with a count of zero, add one each time a Segment crosses the ray from left to right and subtract one each time a path segment crosses the ray from right to left.
trans-unit.target: 从开始计数为零，添加一个每个时间段从左到右和减去一个每个与该射线每当路径段与射线相交从右到左。

trans-unit.source: After counting the crossings, if the result is zero then the point is outside the path.
trans-unit.target: 后对交叉点进行计数，如果结果为零，那么说明该点则位于路径外。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is inside.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它在内部。

trans-unit.source: ![Fill rule illustration](~/add/media/ref-mil-fillrule-stars.PNG "Fill rule illustration") FillRule Example ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ![填充规则图](~/add/media/ref-mil-fillrule-stars.PNG "填充规则图")FillRule 示例 # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: Indicates how the intersecting areas of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry"></xref> are combined.
trans-unit.target: 指示如何相交区域这<xref href="System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry"></xref>相结合。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `EvenOdd`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `EvenOdd`。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry.FillRule*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry.FillRule*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry.FillRule*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry"></xref> describes a geometric shape.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否这<xref href="System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry"></xref>描述几何形状。

trans-unit.source: **true** if this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry"></xref> describes a geometry shape; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true**如果此<xref href="System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry"></xref>描述几何形状; 否则为**false**。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry"></xref> contains a curved segment.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否这<xref href="System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry"></xref>包含曲线的段。

trans-unit.source: **true** if this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry"></xref> object has a curved segment; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true**如果此<xref href="System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry"></xref>对象具有一条曲线的段; 否则为**false**。

trans-unit.source: Opens a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext"></xref> that can be used to describe this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry"></xref> object's contents.
trans-unit.target: 打开<xref href="System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext"></xref>可以用于描述此<xref href="System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry"></xref>对象的内容。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext"></xref> that can be used to describe this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry"></xref> object's contents.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext"> </xref>可以用于描述此<xref href="System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry"></xref>对象的内容。
